question: Which among the following metals were known to Indus Valley Civilisation?
option1: Gold, copper, silver but not iron
option2: Silver, iron, bronze but not gold
option3: Iron, copper, gold but not silver
option4: Zinc, silver, iron but not gold
answer: Gold, copper, silver but not iron
explanation: Variety of metals such as copper, gold, silver was extensively used by the Harappan metal workers
